name: Extreme Dead Target
description:
Hi Captain, this is a zombie shooting game which is different to other killing zombie game. You will see full of dead target run towards you as zombie frontier. This is a 3d zombie games with a scene of a town crowded with FPS zombie dead target. You must kill them and survive in this zombie shooting game.

Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
Easy and simple controls
Horrifying visualization and sounds
Different type of zombies to kill
Different game missions
Variety of guns to choose
Sniper killing missions included
Survival mode and more powerful zombies
